content.name: com.microchip.mcc.x2c.X2CLibrary
content.summary:
MCC X2C Library Summary

The X2C MCC library purpose is to help to create an X2C based project structure. The module creates the necessary framework files and model files. The X2C framework provides an easy model driven software development method, which is a good tool to create complex control algorithms, build complex mathematical systems and for fast prototyping.

More Information

Refer to the release notes above for the list of supported devices and a more in-depth description. Future releases will add features, and support for additional dsPIC33 DSCs.
